AUTO_PAINT_NOTE: Petromin Body & Paint specialize in high quality automotive body and paint repairs fully equipped with the latest technology.We take care of everything all your vehicle needs,from Car scratches and scrapes in the paintwork to general painting and body repairs to restorations and customisation.If you're planning to repaint your vehicle, or cover up some chipped paint, come to Petromin Body & Paint Service and enjoy our services at an affordable cost. Check out our range of services in the table below. However, if you are not sure what category the damage to your vehicle falls under, do get in touch by clicking our contact page herebelow and we will get in touch with you. All our estimates are free of charge with no obligation.
GIVE_CAR_NEW_LOOK: GIVE YOUR CAR A NEW LOOK WITH OUR BODY PAINTING SERVICES
ALLOY_REPAIR: Alloy Repair (repaint) subject to extent of damage
ALLOY_REPAIR_WHEEL: Alloy Repair (Alloy wheels co. )subject to extent of damage
HEADLAMP_REFURBISHMENT_PER_UNIT: Headlamp Refurbishment (per unit & subject to condition)
SERVICE_DIS_DESCRIPTION: Smart Repair Price Matrix provides indicative prices and actual cost may vary. Final Cost Estimates will be provided after the vehicle is inspected by Body & Care. Smart Repair Price Matrix can be subject to change without prior notification.
TRISTAR_NOTE: We at Petromin Tristar centers, have a qualified team of experts who are specialized and trained, use the latest equipment and technologies to find all solutions for transmissions & engines. For all types and models of vehicles
RENEWAL_REPAIRS: Renewal and repair of all types of engines and transmissions
MAINTENANCE_REPAIR: Maintenance and repair of Air-Conditioning systems
TITLE_TRANSFER_CONTENT: Welcome to the vehicle sale e-service through the Absher platform. The service enables you to buy or sell a vehicle and transfer the ownership after you view, examine it, and a mutual consent is reached between the seller and buyer to complete the sale at a specified price. Visit Absher

Our aim is to provide the best levels of service ensuring a pleasant customer experience.Auto Careâs specialized professional technicians in the maintenance of all  models, offer an extensive range of car repair services for cars of all makes and models all under one roof.Auto Care can detect and fix mechanical and electrical requirements of your car by employing tools and diagnostics of the latest technology. We are looking forward to serve you!

META_DESCRIPTION_SELL_FOR_ME: Do you want to sell your car quickly in Saudi Arabia? Sell your car in five easy steps. GoGo Motor offers an easy solution to get a fair price for your car.

ADDITIONAL_TERMS.TERM_1: These offers are subject to availability of stock and the finance offer from respective finance provider.
ADDITIONAL_TERMS.TERM_2: The cars displayed in the advertisements are for illustration purposes only. The actual car purchased may differ in specification and color.
ADDITIONAL_TERMS.TERM_3: The offers are valid until 31st August 2024 or until stock depletion on advertised model year.
ADDITIONAL_TERMS.TERM_4: The monthly installment includes VAT and/or cashback at the end of the 5-year lease term.
ADDITIONAL_TERMS.TERM_5: Monthly installment is calculated based on the entry trim and average insurance rate.
ADDITIONAL_TERMS.TERM_6: The monthly installment will vary based on trim, insurance rate, and credit score from one customer to another.
ADDITIONAL_TERMS.TERM_7: The cashback amount differs based on the vehicle trim level.
ADDITIONAL_TERMS.TERM_8: The offer cannot be combined with any other promotion.
ADDITIONAL_TERMS.TERM_9: These offers are brought to you by FinPalÂ®.
